item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I’m Tobi. Well, also I’m Arno, Walter, Hans, Starney - way to many pseudonyms on the web. On this page I want to manifest my personality, try some new creative things and train writing skills.

item.title: The @Transactional-Kotlin Mismatch
item.description: The JEE/Spring @Transactional Annotation in Kotlin behaves unintuitively when exceptions are thrown and does not rollback by default

item.title: Is The Negation Of Life Goals The Key To Success?
item.description: Setting upper bounds for failures instead of success goals might improve your mindset
